content:
In case you're curious, I'm hacking away on the outline for my RBR talk here:

https://github.com/nikomatsakis/rust-belt-rust-2019

I plan to turn this into proper remark.js slides (I think) fairly soon. I was debating about using hackmd's built-in slide preview facilities (based on reveal.js), but I think I'll ultimately get annoyed at that.
I'm definitely reaching the point where I have to start turning the outline into real slides and practicing though
to see if this flow actually works
(in particular, it's hard to tell how much detail to go into at each point)
I had read the beginnings you committed yesterday and it was nice :)

@nikomatsakis in the slide Definition: Loan, in mode, I think there's a typo, and instead of (either shared or borrowed) it should read (either shared or mutable). BTW, nice explanation! it's very clear!
I've read today's new content, and I love this whole talk :thumbs_up:

in the slide Definition: Loan, in mode, I think there's a typo, and instead of (either shared or borrowed) it should read (either shared or mutable). BTW, nice explanation! it's very clear!

thanks :)
